alert.note: Alert for Clinch; Southern Ware; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 5:56PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Nassau, northern Baker, northern Columbia, northern Suwannee, northwestern Duval, southern Hamilton, southeastern Ware, southeastern Clinch and southeastern Charlton Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 556 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of St. George to near Suwannee River State Park. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Live Oak, Hilliard, Callahan, White Springs, Suwannee River State Park, Suwannee Springs, Taylor, Winfield, Suwannee Valley and St. George. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
